ModMetaData.name: [1.3] WoodLog to WoodPlanks
ModMetaData.author: Wyatt Mingji Lim aka WalkingProblem
ModMetaData.description:
Who the hell uses only wood logs as base materials? Of course you need to cut them up into planks for more efficient usage!!!
added support for: - Refined Floors (27/6) - T MoreFloors (27/6)
